name: Cox’s Bazar
description: The longest sea beach in the world, famous for its golden sand and beautiful sunsets over the Bay of Bengal.

name: Saint Martin’s Island
description: A small coral island in the Bay of Bengal known for its crystal-clear water, coral reefs, and serene beauty.

name: Rangamati
description: A picturesque hill district surrounded by Kaptai Lake and lush green hills, perfect for boat rides and relaxation.

name: Sajek Valley
description: Known as the 'Queen of Hills,' Sajek offers breathtaking views, rolling clouds, and a peaceful tribal lifestyle.

name: Sreemangal
description: The tea capital of Bangladesh, filled with green tea gardens, wildlife sanctuaries, and the famous seven-layer tea.

name: Sundarbans
description: The world’s largest mangrove forest and home to the majestic Royal Bengal Tiger and rich biodiversity.
